overview_of_class: In this class, you will collaborate with fellow designers and the guest director to develop a complete and comprehensive, professional quality, design for a music based work.  The goal of the class is to learn effective techniques for communicating design and technical concepts to fellow designers and the director of a production.  Particular emphasis will be given to effective research for design ideas, collaborative communication and presentation techniques, development of lighting design ideas in concert with the development of scenic and costume design ideas, analysis of music and its ramifications on the design - color, rhythm, etc., and intensive story-board work for design idea development and communication.  By the completion of the class, you are expected to have articulated a professional quality lighting design including necessary design documentation and storyboards exhibiting advanced proficiency of industry standard lighting design graphics and paperwork.
name: Topics in Stage Design
